RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLL ME OVER stalked the pace saving ground to upper stretch engaging from the rail there dueling up gamely. CIRCLE INDY set a pressured pace through the turn being hooked from the inside in upper stretch dueling abreast rival being out gamed at the end. JOR EL pressed then chased through the turn extending into upper stretch giving an even finish near mid track. ROYALLY MEASURED dropped off on the turn lagging to upper stretch out finishhing tired ones there. WILDCAT HAGRID chased on the outside through the turn weakening in upper stretch. BEST AND FINAL played no factor. MY SONG BABY pressed early then tired into upper stretch. GALLAZO ducked in leaving the gate, had brief speed then faded on the turn. CALIFORNIA EMERALD off slowly trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Circle Indy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set a pressured pace, hooked from inside lane, out gamed

ENTRY.NAME: Royally Measured
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off on turn, lagged to lane, improved spot, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Roll Me Over
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, saved ground to lane, dueled up gamely on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Jor El
ENTRY.OWNER: Warren Andrew N and Warren Rania
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed then chased to upper stretch, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Maiden Or Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A B red Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICING pressured the pace through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch finishing with plenty left. RED GUN chased the pace laying close through the turn, no match for the winner down the lane stayed after it saving place. O ROMEO pressed then chased on the turn racing inside to upper stretch proving no match for the winner there. DASH OF FIRE slow early was never in contention outbidding the others down the lane. AWESOME ENOUGH pressed hard on the turn then faded in upper stretch. PALACE TEMPTATION offered little. ALTMEISTER chased through the turn then wilted abruptly in upper stretch. EL PIQUIN was steadied from the gate to the five eighths pole dropping far back.

ENTRY.NAME: O Romeo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, chased inside to lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Dash of Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, well back to lane, outbid the others

ENTRY.NAME: Red Gun
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: El Piquin
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied, from the break far back

ENTRY.NAME: Icing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, shook clear top lane, plenty left

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed on the turn, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 9400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRODY'S JESSICA chased the pace to upper stretch rallying between horses late to win clear. MY GIRL GABBY chased through the turn extending down the lane vying late three deep saving place. PINK PARTY PANTS away alertly set the pace digging in with a clear lead near the rail in upper stretch faltering late. SECRET SEDUCTION weakened on the turn. VAVITE played no factor. M J GOLD folded up on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Pink Party Pants
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, dug in near the rail, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Brody's Jessica
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, rallied clear late

ENTRY.NAME: My Girl Gabby
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended three deep bid lane, saved place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 2F Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Winners At Two Furlongs in 2022-2023 To Carry 2 lbs. Additional For Each Such Race Won).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJUVENATE pressed clear gamely. ENZOEXPRESS racing widest would bid gamely. THREE MILE LIMIT came in bumping foe at the break, rallied. OFFUTT COLE finished well. CAJUN MANDATE bumped at the break would rally. SKYLAS GOLD pressed early then hung inside. BORN FOR VICTORY bucked at the break. INSPIRING JUSTICE angled to the rail for room weakening late. DELAYED ENGAGEMENT pressed early then fading being crowded steadying near the wire. FULCO was always outrun.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARRIOR EMPRESS pressed a narrow lead through the turn clearing along the rail in upper stretch digging in late. FORTUNA ADIUVAT a step slow through the turn rallied in upper stretch bidding willingly late. WEDDING CHAPEL chased the pace through the turn into upper stretch extending there coming up a touch short. QUEEN CASHMERE slow early played no factor. COCO MACHEN pressured the pace through the turn tiring the final eighth. BRYCE'S PHILLY was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior Empress
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed narrow lead, clear on rail lane, dug in late

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuna Adiuvat
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, rallied upper stretch bid willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Wedding Chapel
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended lane, touch short

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS BETTY bid three deep going clear on the turn drawing off down the lane being ridden out. CHARGINA chased to upper stretch proving no match there a clear second best. LOVE MY CHERYL raced evenly posing no threat. GORMLEYESQUE led early being passed on the turn fading in upper stretch. ADMAA reared high at the break. took a bad step after the wire being euthanized on the track.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: three deep clearing on turn, drew off lane, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Chargina
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased to lane, no match, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Admaa
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared high at the break, bad step after wire euthanized on track

ENTRY.NAME: Gormleyesque
ENTRY.OWNER: Burnett Brett Kilgore Shannon and Nicks William A
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, passed on turn, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1 1/4M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 14600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less N ot Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference to Highest Earnings in 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KNIGHT'S CROSS sat patient while close up engaging on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch widening while under a modest drive. ZERO GRAVITY advanced to lead on the backside dueling through the far turn being turned away in upper stretch holding well as second best. FIRST HOMESTEAD set the pace ceding into the far turn racing evenly down the lane to hold the others. BLUE SKY PAINTER tracked the early pace fading on the far turn. BOURBON THUNDER was never involved. REDOUTE'S LIGHT was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: patient laying close up, bid far turn, cleared lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: First Homestead
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded into far turn, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, dueled far turn, no match lane, secured place

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Sky Painter
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked, faded on the far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TENNIS TAP raced evenly through the turn emerging in upper stretch surging up abreast foe late. FINAL EPISODE pressed the pace dropping off on the turn rebidding from the rail in upper stretch ceding late. ABIGAIL G pressed the pace dueling through the turn ceding in upper stretch hanging late. TOP MULE pressed the pace dueling abreast rival on the turn weakening in upper stretch. PARTY SWAGGER raced evenly playing no factor. BLACK LICORICE was pinched back at the break. SAINT FOXY was never involved. SHARP LIFE was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Final Episode
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, ceded turn, came again on rail lane, outbid

ENTRY.NAME: Tennis Tap
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, emerged upper stretch, surged up abreast foe late

ENTRY.NAME: Abigail G
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on turn, ceded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Top Mule
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast on turn, weakened,
